fields.Title: VILLAGE / BOAT
fields.Description: This is the boat you can get from the Net picker. This boat takes you to the Sea Fortress island.VILLAGE ORB / ask boat from netpicker

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Good. You made it." Cuno stands wi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Good. You made it." Cuno stands with his arms akimbo, looking at the shadow of the ruined flak tower looming overhead.

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "It'll keep you company on this lone..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It'll keep you company on this lonely voyage.

fields.Title: You: "Cool."
fields.Dialogue Text: Cool.

fields.Title: You: ""This isn't death island. Is it?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "This isn't death island. Is it?"

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "There. This is now a *Rock and roll..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There. This is now a *Rock and roll* skiff.

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "A skiff with a small steering engin..."
fields.Dialogue Text: A skiff with a small steering engine in the back floats on the calm mirror of the sea. Its two seats are empty.

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "SRV-made, this machine represents h..."
fields.Dialogue Text: SRV-made, this machine represents humanitarian aid from a workers' state on the Samaran isola. The *ROO* logo on the engine gives it away -- that and the white five-pointed star.

fields.Title: You: "(I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: (I'm not ready yet.) [Leave.]

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""What?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "What?"

fields.Title: You: ""What the hell are you talking abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What the hell are you talking about?

fields.Title: You: "What did I just do? Why did I do th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What did I just do? Why did I do that?

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The boat comes to a slow stop. You..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The boat comes to a slow stop. You turn the engine off -- then there's silence.
fields.Alternate1: The boat comes to a slow stop. The lieutenant turns the engine off -- then there's silence.

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "In the silence -- a sputter of wing..."
fields.Dialogue Text: In the silence -- a sputter of wings. A flock of quails takes off in the distance...

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yeah. *Sad* rock and roll. Tune it to Sad FM.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I mapped the place out and uh... i..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I mapped the place out and uh... it looks like both of us aren't gonna make it. This is death island. The hell maw." He wipes snot from his nose.

fields.Title: You: ""You heard me. Don't make me repeat..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You heard me. Don't make me repeat myself."

fields.Title: You: "Say nothing."
fields.Dialogue Text: Say nothing.

fields.Title: You: "Get in and ride to the island."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get in and ride to the island.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: (Variable["auto.visited_island"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.tribunal_kim_shot"])  or  (Variable["auto.visited_island"] == false  and  Variable["plaza.tribunal_kim_shot"] == false  and  IsKimHere() == true)

fields.Title: You: ""Hell island? Finally.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Hell island? Finally."

fields.Title: Logic: "Remember what the Net Picker said:..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Remember what the Net Picker said: It's a small tank. You won't be going back and forth on this.

fields.Title: Esprit de Corps: "Nothing to do here without the lieu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Nothing to do here without the lieutenant... You must return here with him.

fields.Title: Perception (Sight): "The boat's belly is a shiny yellow..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The boat's belly is a shiny yellow colour, industrial paint over fresh tar. You see it reflect off the water, along with the factory number: A72.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. Y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Very cool. Now tune it to Sad FM. You know you want to.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Yes... finally." He says with some..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes... finally." He says with some reservations.

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff bobs in the calm waters...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The skiff bobs in the calm waters. It has nothing more to do.

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "Why? Because *Rock and Roll*."
fields.Dialogue Text: Why? Because *Rock and Roll*.

fields.Title: Inland Empire: "Once you get in, that's it -- one p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Once you get in, that's it -- one pull of the starter handle and you're off into the bay. A strange trepidation comes over you: are you sure you want to go *now*?

fields.Title: You: "[Climb out.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Climb out.]
fields.Sequence: MusicPriorityReset()@4;SemiBlack(true,3); EndgameBoatDone()@3; TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, teqSeafortSkiffLandingLoc, 2)@3; SemiBlack(false,3)@4;

fields.Title: You: ""What 'what'? How else do we blast..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "What 'what'? How else do we blast *Sad FM* on our way to the island?"

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "Sad FM is a radio station specializ..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Sad FM is a radio station specializing in sad, slow rock songs. You seem to know its frequency by heart.

fields.Title: You: ""You take the engine, Kim. I'll hol..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You take the engine, Kim. I'll hold the boombox."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""It'll float.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It'll float."

fields.Title: Shivers: "There is very little wind here toda..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is very little wind here today. The ghost is standing still. You look at your arms, then the cliffs above you...

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Let's go." He whispers."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Let's go." He whispers.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Have you made all the necessary pre..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Have you made all the necessary preparations? Closed all your accounts?

fields.Title: You: ""This banged up old thing... it's a..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This banged up old thing... it's a ROO A72."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine." He gives you resigned shrug..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine." He gives you resigned shrug. "Let's *blast* Sad FM then."

fields.Title: Cuno: ""Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic beca..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Maybe Cuno's just pessimistic because of the massive speed hangover. I did scout the place out. I can fill you in."

fields.Title: Cuno: "The kid turns away from you, cautio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The kid turns away from you, cautiously looking to his left and right. He's on the edge.

fields.Title: Logic: "He hasn't been here before either."
fields.Dialogue Text: He hasn't been here before either.

fields.Title: You: "First -- tie your porta-reel boombo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: First -- tie your porta-reel boombox to the breasthook to keep you company.

dialogueEntries.conditionsString: CheckItem("boombox")  and  IsKimHere() == false  and  Variable["plaza.tribunal_kim_shot"] == true

fields.Title: You: "[Climb out.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Climb out.]
fields.Sequence: MusicPriorityReset()@4;SemiBlack(true,3); EndgameBoatDone()@3; TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, teqSeafortSkiffLandingLoc, 2)@3; TravelTo(Kim Kitsuragi, kimSeafortSkiffLandingLoc, 2)@3; SemiBlack(false,3)@4;

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The skiff floats on the calm mirror..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The skiff floats on the calm mirror of the sea -- its two seats are empty.

fields.Title: You: "[Climb out.]"
fields.Dialogue Text: [Climb out.]
fields.Sequence: MusicPriorityReset()@4;SemiBlack(true,3); EndgameBoatDone()@3; TravelTo(Tequila Sunset, teqSeafortSkiffLandingLoc, 2)@3; SemiBlack(false,3)@4;

fields.Title: Endurance: "He's too banged up himself -- to ta..."
fields.Dialogue Text: He's too banged up himself -- to talk torque with you.

fields.Title: Cuno: ""I don't know." He throws his hands..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know." He throws his hands in the air.

fields.Title: ROO A72 Motor Skiff: "The time has come."
fields.Dialogue Text: The time has come.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Fine. Why not?" He shrugs."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fine. Why not?" He shrugs.
